item.title: ELF Stock Rallies 15% After Hours On Strong Q3 Earnings, Upward Guidance Revision For FY26
item.description: Adjusted EPS for fiscal 2026 is now expected to be $3.05-3.10, exceeding an analyst estimate of $2.87.

item.title: SNAP Stock Rally After Hours As Q4 Revenue Growth Impresses Investors
item.description: Snap’s fourth quarter revenue increased 10% year-over-year to $1.72 billion, beating analysts’ estimates of $1.7 billion, as per data from fiscal.ai.

item.title: Alphabet’s Stock Down Despite Reporting $400B+ Annual Revenue For The First Time - Know Why
item.description: Consolidated Alphabet revenues increased 18% to $113.8 billion in the fourth quarter, the company said.

item.title: Qualcomm Stock Slumps On Downbeat Q2 Earnings Guidance
item.description: The company’s Q1 revenues and adjusted earnings per share, however, beat Wall Street expectations.

item.title: MCD Stock Touches All-Time Highs On Wall Street Optimism Ahead Of Q4 Earnings Report
item.description: According to Stocktwits data, McDonald’s is expected to report its fourth quarter earnings on Feb. 11.
